Perfect comeback Amazing. Perfect mix of big, dramatic and energetic songs and then soft, 
slow songs. You can really tell this album is from deep within Florence's 
emotions and is probably the most personal she's ever been. While it's full 
of emotion, it still doesn't stop it from being immensely fun to listen to 
and there are plenty of songs that just make you want to lose yourself and 
dance.

as well! Great year for music!

I don't usually review anything, But this album is so worth the purchase. I've listened to every track and

audio file can make me feel like crying blows my mind. I hope he does more 
stuff like this. Highly recommended, fan or not.

overrated. Easily an album to pass on.
